name: Jose Marciano Patino
text: I was playing FF9 again, here's an appropriate quote: "Life boils down to 2 simple choices, you either do or you don't?"  Comfort has a funny way of keeping us away from our dreams.  I for one was scared as hell to quit Azeus and go for an MBA.  I was even resentful that I'm graduating during this hard times, where I could have comfortably passed through the recession playing Magic with you guys.  I'm still scared as hell to what the future might bring, but I don't regret my decision to leave and get that MBA.  I know its not my dream, but I know its the start of my dream.  You either do or you don't.
